p:
Male and female WT, CCR5
−/−
, LTα − /− , and IFNγ − /− mice (aged 5–7 weeks) were maintained on a C57BL/6J background. All experiments were age and gender matched. All mice were bred and housed under specific pathogen-free conditions in the Biological Resource Centre, Agency for Science, Technology and Research, Singapore. All experiments and procedures were approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC: 140968) of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research, Singapore, in accordance with the guidelines of the Agri-Food and Veterinary Authority and the National Advisory Committee for Laboratory Animal Research of Singapore.
